title: Creating Antimatter: Matter's "Evil Twin"
description: Physicists have done the math and there should be as much antimatter as matter — but that hasn't been the case so far. NPR Correspondent Geoff Brumfiel explains what's up with matter's "evil twin," antimatter.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Creating Antimatter: Matter's "Evil Twin"
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: NPR's Correspondent Geoff Brumfiel explains what's up with antimatter — and why we know so little about it.
itunes:subtitle: NPR's Correspondent Geoff Brumfiel explains what's up with antimatter — and why we know so little about it.
content:encoded: Physicists have done the math and there should be as much antimatter as matter — but that hasn't been the case so far. NPR Correspondent Geoff Brumfiel explains what's up with matter's "evil twin," antimatter.
